q1.question: How long does it take to set up?
q1.answer: Just 5 minutes! Sign up with Google, choose a template, fill in details, done. If you want to customize more (colors, music, wishlist), it might take 10-15 minutes.

q2.question: Can guests RSVP without an account?
q2.answer: Yes! Guests only need to click the link, fill the RSVP form, done. No sign up required for guests.

q3.question: How does the wishlist work?
q3.answer: You add wishlist items from Shopee/Lazada, our system tracks guest selections. When a guest picks an item, we disable it. No duplicate gifts!

q4.question: Where can I share the link?
q4.answer: Anywhere! WhatsApp, Instagram story, Facebook, email. Wherever you want. The link is yours to share.

q5.question: What if guests don't have smartphones?
q5.answer: The link works on desktop too. The design is responsive, so it looks good everywhere. But realistically, 95% of Malaysians have smartphones now.

q6.question: Is guest data secure?
q6.answer: 100%. We follow Malaysian data protection standards. Your data is safe.

q7.question: Can I get a refund?
q7.answer: Since it's a digital product and you get instant access, no refunds. But we have a free preview/trial mode so you can test before paying.

q8.question: What languages are available?
q8.answer: Malay and English. You can set the default language, and guests can switch if they want.
